body: Welcome to the new [b][color color=#1D80A6]Aerochat[/color][/b]! If you're on the latest version, you'll be able to [i](experimentally)[/i] join voice chats. Enjoy!
Have any feedback? Questions? Answers? Join our [link url=https://discord.gg/EfHdHThNGX]Discord Server[/link]!
The native rewrite is finally here! It boasts better memory usage, higher performance and more accuracy. Read more in the [link url=https://discord.gg/EfHdHThNGX]Discord Server[/link].
Did you know AeroChat has a website? Visit it [link url=https://aerochat.live]here[/link]!
